name: Shot Game (King's Cup)
description: After tapping the start button, the player who starts the game will shake the phone to face up the first card. You can press the list button at the top right of the screen or click the rules button to return to the main menu in order to find out which task card represents. After completing the task, clicking on the open card gives the person to shake the phone and the new task starts for the next player. You can play the game with the general rules or you can play with the special rules created by yourself. While saving your custom rules, you can also share in the top list.
